attributes.title: Worst App on Earth
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it punched my cat in the face?? I didn’t even know apps could do that but this one figured it out. Anyways I was looking at it and it was so hideous my eyes began to bleed. It crashed within 5 seconds and thank god bc it was truly so ugly that it was painful.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever used. I thought hey why not support our narcissistic, racist president by downloading his app but no I highly regret it. It slowed down my phone and added stupidity to my home screen. I didn’t know an app could do this and I’m very disappointed.

attributes.title: I almost croaked because of this app
attributes.review: This app is horrible and I don’t k ow why people would want to have because in the first two days of downloading it it stopped working and then when I was trying to fix it my car broke down and I almost DIED DA

attributes.title: Sad, sickening, and horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible, it takes FOREVER to download. It also makes your phone glitch and sometimes you won’t be able to use other apps until about a day or two LATER. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!

attributes.title: Oh my
attributes.review: Hello fellow Americans. I downloaded this app to see the plans our fantastic not fascist, racist president had planned for our country. After only a day of having the app I began to feel urges. Urges to like him. I quickly deleted the app the and felt much better. Have a wonderful day!

😌🦋 🌺You totally did something💞🧚🏼‍♀️✨ now never do it again 🌻⭐️✨

For real tho, this app is am embarrassment to app developers everywhere. This app is basically just a fat link that takes up space on my phone home screen and storage.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD❤️
attributes.review: I wish i could give a lower review, this app made my phone glitch so bad and when i tried to open other apps they glitched too! on top of that it crashes when i open it. terrible app and couldn’t even function right

attributes.title: this is the WORST & SLOWEST app EVER
attributes.review: it took DAYS to download & when it finally did, it kept exiting out the app when i would try & sign up. it’s a waste of storage. your gigabytes can use their energy on something else that’s actually useful 🙈 please take this app down Apple, k thanks 🥰

attributes.title: stole my information!!!!! don’t download
attributes.review:
ok so i downloaded this app thinking
i would support my president and it stole
all of
my information. it took my credit card number and my address and my name and social security number. they’ve been charging things to my account for months now and there is no way to stop it. the people behind this app must me racist homophobic morons. for ur own safety i would not download the app. i am terrified. wow, really the worst experience i’ve ever had on an app

attributes.title: So bad:(
attributes.review: I want to support my lovely president but it kept booting me off the app. my apps keep disappearing and I see them in cages I can’t even open my apps is see that their really sad they also got separated from their family... really bad glitch please remove this app.
